3.name: Sand
3.description: Throw sand in target's gun - increases jam chance by 15%

4.name: Gun Brush
4.description: Clean your gun - decreases jam chance by 10%

5.name: Bread
5.description: Attract ducks - increases duck spawn rate for 20 minutes

6.name: Hunter's Insurance
6.description: Protects against friendly fire penalties for 24 hours - no XP loss or gun confiscation

7.name: Buy Gun Back
7.description: Get your confiscated gun back with the same ammo it had when taken

8.name: Bucket of Water
8.description: Splash another hunter with water - soaks their clothes and prevents shooting until they dry or buy new clothes

9.name: Dry Clothes
9.description: Change into dry clothes - allows shooting again after being soaked

10.name: Sniper Rifle
10.description: Perfect aim - your shots won't miss for 30 minutes

11.name: Sniper Scope
11.description: Perfect aim - your shots won't miss for 60 minutes

12.name: Duck Whistle
12.description: Instantly summons a duck (if none are present)

13.name: Duck Caller
13.description: Instantly summons a duck (if none are present)

14.name: Duck Horn
14.description: Instantly summons a duck (if none are present)

15.name: Duck Decoy
15.description: Summons a duck in 1 hour (if none are present)

16.name: Duck Radar
16.description: DM alert when a duck spawns in this channel (lasts 6 hours)
